name: Erusal
description: Discover the secrets of the town of Erusal, escape a horrible maniac, and get spooked by this epistolary horror.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 765M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is terrible. It's ridiculous someebody thought they should be trying to charge money for it.
